video.title: H2O: Mermaid Adventures
video.synopsis: Three high school friends who turn into mermaids whenever they touch water have undersea adventures while keeping their new life a secret.

episodes.synopsis: When Cleo, Emma and Rikki get stranded overnight on Mako Island, a magic pool changes the girls' lives forever.
episodes.title: The Secret of Mako Island

episodes.synopsis: While Emma competes in a sand castle contest, Cleo must babysit a high-maintenance intern and save an injured sea turtle.
episodes.title: Caught in the Net

episodes.synopsis: The girls discover a mysterious and ancient mermaid statue and want to return it to an underwater wreck, but treasure hunters have other ideas.
episodes.title: The White Mermaid

episodes.synopsis: When a storm threatens to wash out a yacht-based birthday party, Emma and the girls must save the day -- and the birthday boy.
episodes.title: A Stormy Party

episodes.synopsis: Zane's father plans a luxury resort on Mako Island -- so the girls swim into action to save their beloved retreat from ruin.
episodes.title: Mako Island Hotel

episodes.synopsis: An aggressive blue seaweed attacks Emma, reversing her mermaid powers and forcing her friends to come to the rescue.
episodes.title: The Mysterious Seaweed

episodes.synopsis: When discarded plastic bags pose a threat to Teddy and his sea turtle friends, Lewis and the girls must take extreme measures to stop the menace.
episodes.title: It’s in the Bag!

episodes.synopsis: An atmospheric disturbance results in some disastrous consequences in Dolphin City, which is now labeled as the new Bermuda Triangle.
episodes.title: Dolphin City Triangle

episodes.synopsis: Dolphin City is the location for a Hollywood movie, bringing big stars to town and causing star-crossed trouble under the sea.
episodes.title: Poseidon's Daughter

episodes.synopsis: When Danny the octopus gets captured by the Oceanic Center for observation, it causes problems with his friends and the volleyball tournament.
episodes.title: Dolphin City Mascot

episodes.synopsis: Lewis and the girls must find what's behind mysterious sound waves that create havoc with the whales, dolphins -- and mermaids -- of Dolphin Bay.
episodes.title: Bad Waves

episodes.synopsis: When Berk the shark breaks a tooth and wanders near the beach in pain, he causes a panic in Dolphin City that threatens tourist season.
episodes.title: Jaws-ache!

episodes.synopsis: After spying on her father and worrying that he might be making a big mistake with his new girlfriend, Rikki takes matters into her own hands.
episodes.title: The Lost Ring

episodes.synopsis: Clownfish are disappearing from the bay, so the girls spring into action to find out why. Could a mysterious diver be the culprit?
episodes.title: Reported Missing

episodes.synopsis: When the stone circle causes Cleo to forget that she can turn into a mermaid, Emma and Rikki scramble to keep her from transforming in public.
episodes.title: Memory Lapse

episodes.synopsis: When Lewis promises to tell his Valentine's Day sweetheart, Abby, a big secret, jealous Cleo fears he will give away the girls' mermaid identities.
episodes.title: Valentine's Day

episodes.synopsis: The girls and Bobby the dolphin untangle a mystery when Bobby's twin, Robby, is captured by someone in a mysterious speedboat.
episodes.title: Kidnapped!

episodes.synopsis: When her father goes to sea on a mission, Cleo's worries begin to affect her dreams. But could her nightmares be trying to tell her something?
episodes.title: A Strange Phenomenon

episodes.synopsis: Tired of the racket Miriam and Zane are making at their beach party, Bernie leaves his cave -- giving the Vandals a chance to move right in.
episodes.title: Handle with Care

episodes.synopsis: To protect the White Mermaid, the girls guide explorer Stanley Finch to the underwater stone circle, whose magic makes Stanley think he's a pirate.
episodes.title: The Return of the White Mermaid

episodes.synopsis: When a spell forces Rikki to remain a mermaid until the next full moon, she has to find a way to lay low -- and underwater -- for three full days.
episodes.title: Three Days Underwater

episodes.synopsis: Lewis is thrilled when the university hosts an underwater robot competition, but the girls fret over the safety of their marine friends.
episodes.title: Robot Duel

episodes.synopsis: Emma's younger brother catches a glimpse of her mermaid tail and thinks he's seen a sea monster -- soon the whole town is in an uproar.
episodes.title: The Creature from the Bay

episodes.synopsis: The mermaids turn to a cranky giant octopus for help when the Vandals invade the bay with a horde of stinging jellyfish.
episodes.title: Underwater Takeover

episodes.synopsis: Having played one too many practical jokes, Teddy can't get anyone to believe his warning that an underwater volcano is about to erupt.
episodes.title: Imminent Danger

episodes.synopsis: Lewis joins a famous explorer in a high-tech submarine to hunt for a sunken treasure ship, but a mishap strands them at the bottom of the sea.
episodes.title: Trapped
